com.gdxgame.core.model

Class GameObject

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.gdxgame.core.model.GameObject
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AnimatedGameObject

    public abstract class GameObject
extends Object
    GameObject is one of the core classes for game objects. Each GameObject instance has a position in the game world and a size. It also has a bounding rectangle to check for collisions. It is not necessarily linked with an AnimatedSprite. For that purpose use the AnimatedGameObject class. A GameObject instance always holds a reference to the GameStateLogic in which it was created.

      abstract void update(float deltaTime)
      Each GameObject instance has to implement an update method in order to update the specific game object logic.

    • Method Detail

      • update

        public abstract void update(float deltaTime)
        Each GameObject instance has to implement an update method in order to update the specific game object logic. This method should be called within the update() method of the GameStateLogic
        Parameters:
        deltaTime - time between previous frame and current frame

      • getBoundingRectangle

        public Rectangle getBoundingRectangle()
        returns current bounding rectangle of the game object. The rectangle is defined by the game object's position, width and height
        Returns:
        bounding rectangle of game object
